Jay Krel
December 2006

September 2007 and earlier
  c:\env moved to c:\dev2\j\env
  where c:\dev2\j is the root of source control for my source.
  added Ruby.bat
  renamed Microsoft to MS for MS-DOS compat (8.3)
  *.cmd renamed to *.bat for possible MS-DOS compat
    really need to settle on another better MS-DOS compat scripting language
	such as Perl or Python or Ruby or heck even Tcl, anything but cmd/command.com
	or write my own
